00016 namespace {
00017   // Declare RL Glue variables.
00018   observation_t current_observation;
00019   reward_observation_terminal_t ro;
00020 
00021   const double STEP = 0.05;
00022   const int PUDDLES = 2;
00023   const double PUDDLERADIUS = 0.1;
00024   const int STATE_DIM = 2;
00025   const int NUM_GOALS = 4;
00026 
00027   const int NUM_ACTIONS = 4 + 1 + NUM_GOALS;
00028 
00029   std::vector<std::vector<std::vector<double> > > P; // puddle loci
00030   std::vector<std::vector<double> > GOALS; // coordinates of goals
00031 
00032   std::vector<double> pos; // agent coordinates
00033   std::vector<double> attained_goals; // boolean flags
00034   int num_attained_goals; // number of 1s in attained_goals
00035   bool finished; // true iff agent has attempted the finish action
00036 
00037   Random rng; // Random number generator
00038 }
00039 
00040 double dot(double *u, double *v) {
00041   return u[0] * v[0] + u[1] * v[1];
00042 }
00043 
00044 double distance(const std::vector<double> &state, int p)
00045 {
00046   double v[2];
00047   double w[2];
00048   double z[2];
00049   double d; 
00050 
00051   for(int i=0;i<STATE_DIM;i++){
00052     v[i] = P[p][1][i] - P[p][0][i];
00053     w[i] = state[i] - P[p][0][i];
00054   }
00055 
00056   double c1 = dot(w,v);
00057   if ( c1 <= 0 ) {
00058     d = 0.0; 
00059     for(int i=0;i<STATE_DIM;i++)
00060       d += (state[i] - P[p][0][i]) * (state[i] - P[p][0][i]);
00061     d = std::sqrt(d); 
00062     return d; 
00063   }
00064 
00065   double c2 = dot(v,v);
00066   if ( c2 <= c1 ) {
00067     d = 0.0; 
00068     for(int i=0;i<STATE_DIM;i++)
00069       d += (state[i] - P[p][1][i]) * (state[i] - P[p][1][i]);
00070     d = std::sqrt(d); 
00071     return d; 
00072   }
00073 
00074   double b = c1 / c2;
00075   d = 0.0;
00076   for(int i=0;i<STATE_DIM;i++) {
00077     z[i] =  P[p][0][i] + b * v[i];
00078     d += (state[i] - z[i]) * (state[i] - z[i]);
00079   }
00080   d = std::sqrt(d); 
00081   return d;
00082 }
00083 
00084 double getReward() {
00085   double r; 
00086   int p; 
00087   double d; 
00088 
00089   // standard penalty
00090   r = -1; 
00091 
00092   // puddle penalty
00093   for (p=0;p<PUDDLES;p++) {
00094     d = distance(pos, p);
00095     if ( d < PUDDLERADIUS)
00096       r += - 400.0 * (PUDDLERADIUS - d); 
00097   }
00098 
00099   return r;
00100 }
00101 
00102 void attain_goal(int a) {
00103   const int gidx = a;
00104   const double err = fabs(GOALS[gidx][0]-pos[0]) + fabs(GOALS[gidx][1]-pos[1]);
00105   if (err < 0.1 && attained_goals[gidx] == 0.0) {
00106     attained_goals[gidx] = 1.0;
00107     ++num_attained_goals;
00108   }
00109 }
00110 
00111 double apply(const int &action) {
00112   double noise; 
00113  
00114   // For NIPS, we know that the Action is an int
00115   int a = action;
00116 
00117 //   std::cout << "Current state: (";
00118 //   std::copy(pos.begin(), pos.end(),
00119 //          std::ostream_iterator<double>(std::cout, " "));
00120 //   std::copy(attained_goals.begin(), attained_goals.end(),
00121 //          std::ostream_iterator<double>(std::cout, " "));
00122 //   std::cout << ") Action: " << a << "\n";
00123 
00124   // compute next state out of current state and action
00125 //   if (a >= 4 && a < NUM_ACTIONS)
00126   if (a==0)
00127     pos[1] += STEP; // UP
00128   else if (a==1)
00129     pos[1] -= STEP; // DOWN
00130   else if (a==2) 
00131     pos[0] += STEP; // RIGHT
00132   else if (a==3)
00133     pos[0] -= STEP; // LEFT
00134   else if (a==4) {
00135     if (num_attained_goals >= NUM_GOALS)
00136       finished = true;
00137   } else if (a >= NUM_ACTIONS) {
00138     printf("Invalid action %d %d \n", a, a);
00139     exit(1);
00140   } else
00141     attain_goal(a - 5);
00142 
00143   // add noise
00144   for(int i=0;i<STATE_DIM;i++){
00145     noise = rng.normal() * 0.01;
00146     pos[i] += noise; 
00147     //printf("Noise: %5.3lf ", noise);
00148   }
00149  
00150   // bring state within bounds
00151   for(int i=0;i<STATE_DIM;i++){
00152     if (pos[i]>1.0)
00153       pos[i] = 1.0;
00154     else if (pos[i]<0.0)
00155       pos[i] = 0.0;
00156   }
00157  
00158     //printf("New state: (%5.3lf,%5.3lf) ", pos[0], pos[1]); 
00159 
00160   // prepare return values;
00161   return getReward();
00162 
00163  //printf("Reward: %8.6lf) ", ro.r); 
00164 }
00165 
00166 bool terminalp()
00167 {
00168   // XXX
00169   return finished;
00170 //   return fabs(GOALS[0][0]-pos[0]) + fabs(GOALS[0][1]-pos[1]) < 0.1;
00171 }

00173 const char *env_init()
00174 {
00175   P.resize(PUDDLES,
00176            std::vector<std::vector<double> >(2, std::vector<double>(2)));
00177   GOALS.resize(NUM_GOALS, std::vector<double>(STATE_DIM));
00178 
00179   pos.resize(STATE_DIM);
00180   attained_goals.resize(NUM_GOALS);
00181 
00182   P[0][0][0] = 0.10; //puddle #1, point #1, x
00183   P[0][0][1] = 0.75; //puddle #1, point #1, y
00184   P[0][1][0] = 0.45; //puddle #1, point #2, x
00185   P[0][1][1] = 0.75; //puddle #1, point #2, y
00186   
00187   P[1][0][0] = 0.45; //puddle #2, point #1, x
00188   P[1][0][1] = 0.40; //puddle #2, point #1, y
00189   P[1][1][0] = 0.45; //puddle #2, point #2, x
00190   P[1][1][1] = 0.80; //puddle #2, point #2, y
00191            
00192   //-------------- RANDOM GOAL POS
00193 
00194   for (int gidx = 0; gidx < NUM_GOALS; ++gidx) {
00195     double d1=0.0, d2 = 0.0;
00196     while( d1 < PUDDLERADIUS || d2 < PUDDLERADIUS) {
00197       GOALS[gidx][0] = rng.uniform();
00198       GOALS[gidx][1] = rng.uniform();
00199       d1 = distance(GOALS[gidx], 0);
00200       d2 = distance(GOALS[gidx], 1);
00201     }
00202   }
00203 
00204   // Handle RL Glue stuff.
00205   allocateRLStruct(&current_observation, 0, 2 + NUM_GOALS, 0);
00206   std::fill(current_observation.doubleArray,
00207             current_observation.doubleArray + current_observation.numDoubles,
00208             0.0);
00209   ro.observation = &current_observation;
00210   ro.terminal = 0;
00211   ro.reward = 0.0;
00212 
00213   std::stringstream response;
00214   response << "VERSION RL-Glue-3.0 PROBLEMTYPE episodic DISCOUNTFACTOR 1 ";
00215   response << "OBSERVATIONS DOUBLES (" << STATE_DIM + NUM_GOALS << " 0 1) ";
00216   response << "ACTIONS INTS (0 " << NUM_ACTIONS - 1 << ") ";
00217   response << "REWARDS (" << -400.0 * PUDDLERADIUS * PUDDLES << " 0) ";
00218   response << "EXTRA FlagPuddleWorld by Nicholas K. Jong.";
00219   static std::string buffer;
00220   buffer = response.str();
00221   return buffer.c_str();
00222 }
00223 
00224 void env_cleanup()
00225 {
00226   clearRLStruct(&current_observation);
00227 
00228   pos.clear();
00229   GOALS.clear();
00230   P.clear();
00231 }
00232 
00233 const observation_t *env_start()
00234 {
00235   pos[0] = rng.uniform();
00236   pos[1] = rng.uniform();
00237   fill(attained_goals.begin(), attained_goals.end(), 0.0);
00238   num_attained_goals = 0;
00239   finished = false;
00240 
00241   std::copy(pos.begin(), pos.end(), current_observation.doubleArray);
00242   std::copy(attained_goals.begin(),
00243             attained_goals.end(),
00244             current_observation.doubleArray + pos.size());
00245   ro.reward = 0.0;
00246   ro.terminal = 0;
00247 
00248   return &current_observation;
00249 }
00250 
00251 const reward_observation_terminal_t *env_step(const action_t *a)
00252 {
00253   ro.reward = apply(a->intArray[0]);
00254   ro.terminal = terminalp() ? 1 : 0;
00255 
00256   std::copy(pos.begin(), pos.end(), current_observation.doubleArray);
00257   std::copy(attained_goals.begin(),
00258             attained_goals.end(),
00259             current_observation.doubleArray + pos.size());
00260 
00261   return &ro;
00262 }   
00263 
00264 const char* env_message(const char* _inMessage) {
00265   std::stringstream response;
00266   std::stringstream message(_inMessage);
00267 
00268   // Tokenize the message
00269   std::istream_iterator<std::string> it(message);
00270   std::istream_iterator<std::string> end;
00271   
00272   while (it != end) {
00273     std::string command(*it++);
00274     if (command.compare("set-random-seed") == 0) {
00275       if (it == end) {
00276         response << "FlagPuddleWorld received set-random-seed with no argument.\n";
00277       } else {
00278         std::string seed_string(*it++);
00279         int seed = atoi(seed_string.c_str());
00280         rng.reset(seed);
00281         response << "FlagPuddleWorld set random seed to " << seed << ".\n";
00282       }
00283     } else {
00284       response << "FlagPuddleWorld did not understand '" << command << "'.\n";
00285     }
00286   }
00287 
00288   static std::string buffer;
00289   buffer = response.str();
00290   return buffer.c_str();
00291 }
